IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROMOTE THE INDEPENDENT PETROLEUM PRODUCERS INDUSTRY IN CALIFORNIA AND THE UNITED STATES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROMOTE THE INDEPENDENT PETROLEUM PRODUCERS INDUSTRY IN CALIFORNIA AND THE UNITED STATES.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED OPPORTUNITIES FOR HUNDREDS OF INDUSTRY MEMBERS TO PROMOTE THEIR INDUSTRY IN A PROFESSIONAL AND EFFECTIVE MANNER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Management of CIPA has evaluated its tax positions and related income tax contingencies. Management does not believe that any material uncertain tax positions exist.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part I, Line 1a: Relevant information in regards to selections on 1a.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CEO RECEIVED PAYMENTS OF $1,200 FOR EXPENSES RELATED TO MAINTAINING A HOME OFFICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 6: Explanation of Classes of Members or Shareholder
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PRODUCING MEMBERS SELECT MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS MAKES ALL CRITICAL DECISIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7b: Describe Decisions of Governing Body Approval by Members or Shareholders
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BY-LAW CHANGES AND BOARD OF DIRECTORS MEMBERSHIP ARE SUBJECT TO FULL MEMBERSHIP VOTE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CIPA'S FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE FORM 990. IT IS ALSO AVAILABLE TO ANY MEMBER THAT REQUESTS IT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE MEETS ONCE A YEAR FOR PERSONNEL EVALUATIONS AND DETERMINES COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CIPA'S DOCUMENTS, POLICIES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC, IF REQUESTED, AFTER THE REQUEST IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY CIPA'S MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Other Changes In Net Assets Or Fund Balances - Other Decreases

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: PROMOTE THE NATURAL GAS INDUSTRY IN CAL
